title: How to Draw a Wild Flower

steps.headline: Draw a circle in the upper part of the sheet and a vertical line, a bit curved.
Divide the circle by a number of small lines that will be shaped for petals later.
Draw a small circle in the middle of the larger circle, sketch two leaves on left and right.
Draw petals of the flower using U shaped lines starting from the middle.
Color the contours of the flower.
steps.description: Use red for petals, green for stems and leaves, and yellow for the middle.

steps.headline: Color the whole image.
steps.description: Use different shades to make the flower look more natural.

tyn: For drawing on paper: a sheet of paper, a pencil.
For drawing on screen: iPad, or any other tablet, a drawing application.
text: Draw a circle in the upper part of the sheet and a vertical line, a bit curved.  Divide the circle by a number of small lines that will be shaped for petals later. Draw stems for leaves. Draw a small circle in the middle of the larger circle, sketch two leaves on left and right.  Draw petals of the flower using U shaped lines starting from the middle.  Delete all unnecessary lines.  Color the contours of the flower. Use red for petals, green for stems and leaves, and yellow for the middle. Color the whole image. Use different shades to make the flower look more natural.
